description:
Job Description:

Claynosaurz is at the forefront of leveraging emerging technologies to build a global IP through animation, gaming, product development, e-commerce, community, and more. We are disrupting the entertainment industry and how traditional brands are built by specializing in creating captivating content that resonates with audiences worldwide. We are looking for a Social Media Marketing Manager with a passion for branded entertainment to elevate our social media presence.


Responsibilities:

Growth & Brand Awareness Strategy:

  • Develop and implement effective social media strategies focusing on growth while enhancing the brand's image and awareness primarily on Instagram and TikTok.
  • Collaborate with marketing, animation, and graphic design teams to create cohesive and engaging content focusing on emerging trends and story-telling.


Content Creation & Management:

  • Identify new trends and lead the creation of high-quality and creative content for various social media platforms with a heavy focus on Instagram.
  • Coordinate with marketing and graphic design departments to produce visually appealing and engaging e-commerce and product marketing posts.
  • Expertly manage content calendars and scheduling.


Community Engagement & Activation:

  • Actively monitor and respond to direct messages and comments across all social media accounts.
  • Foster a positive and interactive community by engaging with followers and addressing their inquiries or feedback promptly.


E-commerce Management (Toys and Apparel):

  • Set up and manage the brand's Instagram e-shop, ensuring a seamless and user-friendly experience.
  • Utilize Instagram's e-commerce features to drive online sales and convert users to our direct-to-consumer shopping experience.
  • Collaborate with marketing and creative on unique content ideas and ad campaigns to drive sales and conversions to our collectible line of products.


Advertising & Analytics:

  • Plan and execute influencer and paid advertising campaigns to increase brand visibility and drive conversions.
  • Analyze social media metrics and report on the performance of campaigns, making data-driven recommendations for improvement.


Requirements:

  • Proven experience as a Social Media Manager at a global media franchise or in the entertainment industry.
  • Strong understanding of Instagram with a track record of creating successful content.
  • Experience in brand building, storytelling, and e-commerce, particularly on Instagram.
  • Ability to coordinate and collaborate with animation and graphic design teams.
  • Excellent creative writing skills and ability to establish and maintain brand voice guidelines.
  • Proficiency in monitoring and managing social media interactions.
  • Experience in running influencer and paid advertising campaigns on social media.
  • Strong analytical skills and ability to interpret social media metrics.


Preferred Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
  • Experience in setting up and managing e-commerce shops on Instagram.
  • Knowledge of other social media platforms (TikTok, X (Twitter), LinkedIn) and emerging trends on each platform.
  • Familiarity with social media management tools and analytics platforms.
  • Understanding of web3 technologies is a plus.
